name: Salads

pages.text: $(thing)Salads$() are a meal prepared in a $(thing)Bowl$() from up to five $(thing)Fruits$(), $(thing)Vegetables$(), or $(thing)Cooked Meats$(). Salads are made in a special salad screen, created with a $(thing)Bowl$().
Ceramic bowls are made through the knapping and firing of clay.

The salad screen is opened by pressing $(item)$(k:key.use)$() while holding $(item)$(k:key.sneak)$(). Add the foods. When you are ready, take your salad out of the slot on the right side.$(br2)The $(l:getting_started/food_and_water)Nutrients$(), Water, and Saturation of a salad are 75% of the total of all nutrients of its ingredients. When a salad is made, its decay refreshes.
